description:
In this course I will teach you step by step how to create your own iOS puzzle game, how to create your hand made graphics for this game and finally how to test this game, prepare icons and publish it to the App Store.

You will get the whole package. From blank sheet to final game ready for sale.

We will cover 3 sections. First section is about Sketch - vector graphics software - which will allow us to create our game assets. Next section will be about Xcode - development environment - where we will use Swift language and sprites to create our game scene and logic. Last section is about publishing final game to the App Store, in this section we will create all needed resources like icons and game screenshots.

This course is divided into 27 lectures. It takes about 5 hours to complete.

If you ever wanted to create your own game, but felt overwhelmed by sheer extent of tasks you would need to make, this is the perfect opportunity for you. I managed to squeeze every essential aspects of creating iOS game to 5 hours.
title: Catch The Snake - iOS game from scratch to App Store
